import React, { Component } from 'react' class Cart extends Component { state={ arr: [] } componentDidMount(){ fetch("/shopping-cart") .then(res => res.json()) .then(arr => this.setState({ arr })); } render() { return (
{this.state.arr.map(x=>(
${x.brand} ${x.model}
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit.
${x.price} $ ))}
) } } export default Cart
